content: vintage vibes lace knit beret free pattern by katherine grushevskaya make this simple beret in your favorite color and feel some magic vintage vibes 1 skill level easy / beginner friendly one size 22-24 56-60 cm head circumference alternatively you may follow the recipe on page 5 for any size notes vintage vibes is worked bottom up in the round in one piece supplies original yarn 40-50 g of coffil cashfive 5% cashmere 30% wool 30% viscose 35% acrylic 360 m 384 yds per 100 g skein alternatively use any yarn in suggested yardage needles us 4 / 3 5 mm circular needles 24-32 length cable notions stitch markers scissors gauge 26 sts & 34 rnds is 4 10 cm in stockinette stitch on 3 5mm needles abbreviations add -
